sense.def:
Besedo
she
uporabljamo za žensko ali dekle, ki je že prej omenjena v besedilu ali pogovoru ali katere identiteta je znana.

seg.quote: ‘So long,’ Mary said as she passed Miss Saunders.
Ask her if she can do something with them.

sense.def:
Beseda
she
se uporablja tudi, ko govorimo o državah.

seg.quote: Britain is a poor nation now, and she would do well to remember this.

sense.def:
Beseda
she
se uporablja tudi za ladje, avtomobile ali druga vozila.
